text: Michael Fanafel (born 23 January 1983), is a retired Micronesian footballer who played as a forward. ==International career== Fanafel represented the Federated States of Micronesia at the 2003 Pacific Games. ==Career statistics== === International === {| class="wikitable" style="text- align:center" |- !
